name: Ember Knight Solitaire
description:
Accept an epic quest to track down the Ember Knight and unearth incredible treasures in this captivating solitaire adventure! During your journey, you will need to show strength and determination to overcome a variety of challenges and defeat vicious enemies in battle mode!

  • 200 solitaire challenges
  • Follow a captivating narrative
  • Multiple game modes
  • Exciting mini-games and hidden objects
  • Wild cards, power ups and jokers
  • 3 difficulty levels
  • 3 game modes: One Up, One Down; Match 2; Make 14
  • Vanquish enemies in the Battle mode card game!
